last_episode_to_air.name: Week 6: Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nashville is the backdrop for the final three couples as they compete for musical fame, fortune and love; celebrity judges Kaitlyn Bristowe, Jason Tartick, Taye Diggs, Rita Wilson and Jewel select the winning couple.

name: The Bachelor Presents: Listen to Your Heart
original_name: The Bachelor Presents: Listen to Your Heart
overview: 20 single men and women embark on an incredible journey to find love through music. Singing well-known songs, both individually and as couples, they will look to form attractions through the melodies, find and reveal their feelings, and ultimately fall in love.

episodes.name: Week 1: Series Premiere
episodes.overview: Twenty musicians from across the country arrive looking for love and musical chemistry; two men try to serenade the same woman; Ryan gets caught in a love triangle; Plain White T's put on a private concert for a pair.

episodes.name: Week 2
episodes.overview: Jamie is torn between two men, but chooses one and goes on a date in Venice, Calif.; Bri and Chris deal with trust issues; two new arrivals become Brandon's admirers; the 11 unattached women try to get a rose from the eight available men.

episodes.name: Week 3
episodes.overview: Savannah discovers that Brandon may have been two-timing her with Julia; each couple is assigned a song and starts rehearsing; the anxious couples are stunned to see who will be judging their romantic and musical harmony.

episodes.name: Week 4
episodes.overview: The six remaining couples survived the first round of musical performances, but another shocking surprise awaits them. They will be switching partners and going on dates with someone in another couple in order to test their relationships and their all-important chemistry. The drama reaches epic proportions before the couples prepare to hit the stage again with celebrity judges ready to weigh in on their musical talent and the chemistry expressed in their performances.

episodes.name: Week 5: Semi-Finals
episodes.overview: After a tough round of judging and tearful goodbyes, the final four couples take their relationships and performing talents to Las Vegas, traveling by luxury tour buses.

episodes.name: Week 6: Finale
episodes.overview: Nashville is the backdrop for the final three couples as they compete for musical fame, fortune and love; celebrity judges Kaitlyn Bristowe, Jason Tartick, Taye Diggs, Rita Wilson and Jewel select the winning couple.
